description: This file defines a small REST client for interacting with a tasks API endpoint, providing CRUD operations such as list, create, patch, and delete tasks. It manages environment configuration, error handling, and request abstraction.
external_files: fetch API (native in browsers and environments like Node with appropriate polyfills)

methods.name: getApiBase()
methods.description: Retrieves the API base URL from environment variables and formats it.

methods.name: parseJsonOrText(res)
methods.description: Parses the response as JSON if content type is JSON; otherwise returns the text in an object.

methods.name: createApiClient()
methods.description: Factory function that returns an API client object with methods to perform CRUD operations on tasks.

methods.name: listTasks
methods.description: Fetches all tasks from the API.

methods.name: createTask
methods.description: Creates a new task with the provided payload.

methods.name: patchTask
methods.description: Updates an existing task identified by id with the provided payload.

methods.name: deleteTask
methods.description: Deletes the task with the specified id.
